snippet: A roundup of the latest polls, most of which still give President Obama with a slim lead over Mitt Romney, with it still too soon to tell what the impact will be of Paul Ryan's addition to the Republican ticket.
abstract: A roundup of the latest polls, most of which still give President Obama with a slim lead over Mitt Romney, with it still too soon to tell what the impact will be of Paul Ryan's addition to the Republican ticket.

headline.main: Aug. 11: Will Ryan Pick Move the Polls?
